content:
I went to a talk by Tillie Walden at MICE last year and she mentioned that Scott McCloud (one of her early mentors) is popular with geeks and techies like her dad (who signed her up for a comics class).

I'm not sure if that's true or not but he did created a comic for Chrome in 2008 when it came out. If you're an old fart like me, you might remember it.

Perhaps you've seen his Coins of the Realm comic about micropayments.

Anyway, he'll be at MICE on Sunday. Tickets to MICE are free. You might be able to just walk in but I got some for Sunday just in case (ND Stevenson of Nimona fame is also giving a talk that day). So I should be there. Lemme know if you wanna meet up! Here's the MICE website: https://www.micexpo.org
